short_description: WATERPROOF& LEAKPROOF PROTECTION: Engineered with a durable inner layer to prevent liquid penetration, our blanket for pets offers effective protection that lasts. This versatile blanket is suitable for chair, car, couch, bed, and outdoor use, and is perfect for dogs, cats, and puppies alike. It will keep your furry friend dry and comfortable in any situation.

CALMING COMFORT: Our waterproof fleece pet blanket provides a soft, plush place for your pup to rest. One side features cozy and soft Sherpa fleece while the other has calming faux fur to mimic a mother's fur coat. Designed to offer superior comfort and a reassuring sense of security, allowing them to rest and relax with ease.

VERSATILE HOME & TRAVEL COMPANION: Designed to safeguard furniture against chewing, scratching, and shedding, this blanket provides a combination of comfort for your pet and protection for your home (or car). Its multifunctional design makes it an ideal choice for pet owners seeking to keep their living spaces clean and tidy. It also makes an excellent travel blanket, dog crate liner, and kennel mat.

ELEGANT REVERSIBLE DESIGN: This two-sided blanket features plush faux fur and advanced dyeing techniques. It not only enhances your home’s décor but also provides a calming and soothing experience for both you and your pet. Its versatile design easily complements any space, whether it’s on a bed, sofa, chair, or couch, adding a touch of sophistication while ensuring your pet’s comfort.

EASY TO CLEAN & PORTABLE: Its convenience is at the forefront, with our pet blanket able to be cleaned by placing it in a washing machine with cold water and tumble drying on a low setting. The lightweight design makes it easy to transport, ideal for use on the go, whether you're going to the beach, on a road trip, camping, or for any other activity you have planned with your pet.

Waterproof & Leakproof Design: Featuring a central waterproof membrane, this blanket effectively prevents liquid from leaking in either direction—whether from the flannel fleece side to the Sherpa side, or vice versa. Your furniture stays dry, no matter how you place it.

name: Pet Parents Pawtect Premium Waterproof Cat & Dog Blanket with WickQuick & Sherpup Technology, Puppy & Cat Blanket, Slate 32x40
short_description: 100% WATERPROOF PET BLANKET - Our premium cat & dog blankets are slobber, water, and urine proof! WickQuick draws moisture into the dog blanket, so no liquid puddles on top, slides, & spill outs like other blankets! EdgePawtector pushes any liquid into the waterproof dog blanket, & our Sherpup fabric ensures that moisture in the blanket won't seep because of its waterproof impermeable barrier. Our dog & cat blankets will help your cuddles with your dogs, cats, or other furbabies stay dry & cozy!

PAWTECTING FURNITURE & YOUR HOME - Protect your furniture from scratches, drool, shedding, and those occasional accidents when your pet gets a little too excited to see you. Our stylish & waterproof pet blanket is perfect for your bed, couch, favorite chair, car, or anywhere else your pet likes to hang out! Not only are our pet blankets for protecting furniture, but they are unmatched at protecting your cuddle time with your furbaby.

UNMATCHED SOFTNESS & COZINESS – Never sacrifice you or your family’s comfort for protection. What's the point of blankets for dogs & a cat blanket if they don't make you want to snuggle up with your pet all day? Our original Pawtect Blankets are made with our specially created faux fur fabric, & our proprietary Sherpup multi-layered fabric which is perfect for more than just ensuring that moisture won't seep through the pet throw blanket, they're also irresistibly soft and comfortable!

MODERN, NEUTRAL, STYLISH COLORS TO MATCH YOUR HOME – Our pet blankets for dogs perfectly blend comfort and style to ensure messes and stains are a thing of the past. You can now focus on snuggling with your furbaby instead of struggling with the stain remover. Our premium puppy blanket features top-rated, modern colors, and the perfect sizing! Your guests will have no idea your newest throw also doubles as pawtection from pet messes!

DONT SETTLE FOR AN "ALL THE SAME" PET BLANKET - Get a Pawtect Blanket. Our premium dog blanket leads with our proprietary WickQuick fabric, LockJaw edges for added durability, our proprietary Sherpup fabric, for a waterproof barrier & ultimate softness. Our dog throw blankets, whether for dog blankets for small dogs, dog blankets for medium dogs, dog blankets for large dogs, cats, guinea pigs, lizards, you get it, our Pawtect Blanket is purrfect for all shapes, sizes, & types of furbabies.

name: FurHaven Waterproof Throw Blanket for Dogs & Indoor Cats, Reversible Protective Pet Blanket, Medium, Long Faux Fur & Velvet, Driftwood
short_description: Protect Furniture Without Sacrifice: Stop worrying about muddy paws, shedding fur, and accidental spills ruining your favorite couch or bed. Our waterproof dog blanket features a protective velvet side that acts as a reliable barrier against dirt and moisture, while the luxurious long faux fur adds a soft, textured accent that naturally complements your home décor. This pet blanket works equally well as a cat blanket for indoor cats.

Two Sides Of Comfort: Give your pet the cozy experience they deserve with our dual-sided dog blanket measuring at 40"L x 30"W x 0.25"H. The plush long faux fur side invites nestling and burrowing on chilly nights, while the smooth velvet side offers a cooler touch during warmer months. Whether you need a dog blanket for medium dogs or a cat blanket for indoor cats, your pet gets year-round comfort.

Encourage Deeper, Restful Sleep: Gentle, soothing fabrics cradle your pet in softness, creating a calming sleep surface that promotes relaxation and encourages longer, more restorative naps. Whether used as a dog bed blanket, a dog crate blanket, or draped over furniture, this blanket for dogs transforms any spot into their favorite resting place. Perfect as a puppy blanket for growing pups as well.

Effortless Cleanup For Parents: Life with pets is messy, your blanket shouldn't be hard to clean. Our fully machine washable design makes maintenance simple: just toss the dog blanket in the washer and line dry to preserve the waterproof coating and maintain that luxurious softness. Spend less time cleaning and more time enjoying moments with your furry friend.

Cozy Protection For Every Spot: We designed this waterproof dog blanket to be the ultimate shield for your home and a warm retreat for your pet. Whether draped as a stylish furniture protector over your sofa, used as a rugged car seat cover, or layered inside a crate, this pet throw creates a familiar, cozy barrier against spills, dander, and claws. It is the essential, washable layer that keeps your living space clean without compromising on comfort.
product_description: FurHaven offers the perfect solution. Our reversible waterproof dog blanket combines sophisticated home décor with serious protection. One side features luxuriously soft long faux fur that invites snuggling and adds elegant texture to any room. Flip it over, and the smooth velvet side, reinforced with a waterproof coating, shields your furniture from spills, accidents, and daily wear while maintaining a sleek appearance. Both surfaces are gentle on sensitive noses and paws, creating a soothing environment that encourages your pet to nestle, burrow, and enjoy deeper rest. Whether you need a dog blanket for medium dogs who love to sprawl, a puppy blanket for pups seeking warmth, or a cat blanket for indoor cats, this versatile pet blanket adapts to their needs throughout every season and life stage. Frequently Asked Questions How do I clean and maintain the blanket? It's simple. Our pet blankets are fully machine washable for hassle-free care. After washing, line dry the blanket to preserve the waterproof coating and maintain the soft, luxurious texture. Follow the care instructions on the seam label for best results. Will the waterproof coating really protect my furniture? Yes. The velvet side features a waterproof coating specifically designed to shield against dirt, spills, and accidents. Simply place this side up when you need maximum protection for your couch, or flip to the faux fur side when your pet wants extra coziness. Why should I choose FurHaven? Because we believe pets are family. Your purchase is protected by a 90-Day Limited Coverage against material defects, with 60-Day Worry Free Guarantee. We promise proven support, pet-safe materials, and an easy-care design that simplifies your life.

short_description: 🐕【Soft and Skin-Friendly Texture】: This dog blanket will become an essential item for your furry family member at home, bringing you and your pet closer together. Designed with “comfort and warmth” in mind, it offers an exceptional sleeping experience, enveloping your pet in cozy warmth. Crafted from high-density woven flannel and cotton fleece, it delivers a delicately soft feel with lasting comfort and durability.

🐕【Waterproof and Splash-Resistant Design】: This pet blanket features an integrated waterproof TPU layer, tested through thousands of liquid penetration experiments to effectively prevent moisture from seeping through to the underlying fabric, ensuring a dry and comfortable experience.Note: Flannel and Cotton fleece fabrics are not waterproof.

🐕【Double-Sided Comfort】: Our pet blanket features a triple-layer construction for reversible use. 🐕【Bed & Sofa Protector】: This waterproof blanket effectively shields against liquid spills, pet hair, stains, and other common messes, keeping your sofa, bed, and pet cages fresh and clean for longer. It's an essential item for both home life and travel with your furry friends.

🐕【Easy to clean】: Machine-washable design. Simply air dry or tumble dry at low temperature to restore it to like-new condition. This reduces your cleaning hassle, giving you more time to enjoy heartwarming moments with your furry companion.
